question: Which Indian entrepreneur has won the prestigious International Business Person of the Year award in London for innovative IT solutions?
explanation: Birendra Sasmal, a Ghana-based Indian entrepreneur, has won a prestigious International Business Person of the Year at the Asian Achievers Awards in London for his efforts to bring innovative IT solutions to Africa. Sasmal is CEO of Subah Group, which employs around 350 people with offices in Guinea, Sierra Leone, New York City and Dubai. Under Sasmal\'s leadership, the group\'s revenues have increased by over 3,000% and it has been named among one of Africa\'s fastest growing tech companies.
